EmailTemplate.name: Strategic: Local Economic Impact
EmailTemplate.subject: We’d love to work together with you.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
I want to take this opportunity to introduce myself. My name is INSERT YOUR NAME and I am an Enterprise Business Development Manager with Office Depot for the Alabama market. I would like to connect with you to discuss the value that Office Depot can bring to your organization as a total business services solution. For the past INSERT YOUR NUMBER OF YEARS EXPERIENCE, I have specialized in helping organizations of your size and scope.
Office Depot knows how important it is to be a leader within the community. You’re not just our customer, you’re our neighbor and it’s important that we provide and contribute to the local economy.
· In the state of INSERT STATE we employ hundreds of people either through retail or B2B.
· We reach out to entire communities through our corporate citizenship efforts.
· We support diverse organizations and causes with funding, product donations, and volunteerism.
· Office Depot OfficeMax has INSERT NUMBER OF stores in INSERT STATE.
Office Depot understands that partnering with an organization is much more than just providing a website address—we have a dedicated team committed to taking care of you and your needs. We partner with our customers, getting to know what matters most, setting goals, and celebrating milestones as we make things happen together. Together, we evaluate processes and make changes to implement meaningful solutions.
Would you be open to a casual introductory meeting? Or is there someone else on your team I can meet with to discuss a partnership opportunity?
Thank you,
{!User.Name}
{!User.Market__c}
{!User.Phone} {!User.Extension}
{!User.Email}
